channel.title: Need more detailed information about Tensilica TIE language
channel.description:
Few days ago I started to debug programm for Xtensa processors. Today i find out, that there is possible for user to create additional commands fot processor with [TIE Language](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tensilica_Instruction_Extension). There is not very much documentation in the network and the software for creating commands with TIE, [Xtensa Xplorer](https://tensilicatools.com/download/xplorer-evaluation-download/), available only in demo version.
The questions are:
* Is it possible to find user-created commands in the ELF file?
* If yes, where they can be?
* If no, how are they translated to the processor?
* How this commands can be translated to electrical signals correctly?
Thanks in advance.
